creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical red object that fills most of the picture plane; a circle in its center consists of interweaving fine lines; heavier black lines around the object's center spiral outwards towards its border; a chain-like, turquoise design adorns background; additional beige markings throughout
inscription: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated on verso
signed:
LM: [John Newman 1985/TRIAL PROOF (FIRST VERSION) (REJECTED)/ARCHIVE]
Verso: [FOLD OUT (TRIAL PROOF - FIRST VERSION)]
title: Fold-Out
